silmë is a noun meaning "starlight" in Q: Image:Silme.gifSilmë is also the name in Quenya of the twenty-ninth letter of the Tengwar alphabet.  In all modes this letter represents S.
The names of the letters: The additional letters The Westron name for this letter is Só.See Westron Tengwar

silmë is a noun meaning "starlight" in Q: The word derives from the Primitive Quendian Sundocarme SIL.
